title: The Last Leg in Paris
overview: Adam Hills, Alex Brooker and Josh Widdicombe are live in Paris throughout the 2024 Paralympic Games to reflect and give their unique take on the day's events - all with their usual comedic twist. Special guests from the worlds of sport and entertainment will also film VTs from the Games, and this year The Last Leg hosts are joined by semi-regular guest and comedian Josh Pugh, who'll bring all the latest news and action live from the ground in Paris.
